name: @takuma-ru/vue-swipe-modal
description: Swipeable Bottom Sheet library for vue2 and vue3
author: takuma-ru <kcattdev@gmail.com> (https://github.com/takuma-ru/)

scripts.publish:major: pnpm build && pnpm dlx release-it major --ci
scripts.publish:minor: pnpm build && pnpm dlx release-it minor --ci
scripts.publish:patch: pnpm build && pnpm dlx release-it patch --ci
scripts.publish:major-beta: pnpm build && pnpm dlx release-it major --preRelease=beta --ci
scripts.publish:minor-beta: pnpm build && pnpm dlx release-it minor --preRelease=beta --ci
scripts.publish:patch-beta: pnpm build && pnpm dlx release-it patch --preRelease=beta --ci
scripts.publish:prerelease: pnpm build && pnpm dlx release-it prerelease --ci
